backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining trades, settings, user profiles, authorization checks, and CRUD operations with storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing frontend retry/backoff improvements for backend-unavailable startup scenarios and listing affected files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files covering mappers, UI components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme file defining OKLCH color tokens for light/dark modes and global CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app, manifest, icons, and II_URL environment config.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling identity loading, authentication gating, theming, and QueryClient setup.
frontend/src/app/AuthenticatedApp.tsx: Authenticated shell running startup initialization with retry/backoff, error handling, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/app/queryClient.ts: Creates and configures a global React Query client with default caching and retry policies.
frontend/src/app/router.tsx: Defines application routes for Dashboard, Journal, Tools, Settings, and About using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginBrandi: Login branding component rendering the logo with a text fallback if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginView.t: Login page using Internet Identity with loading, error handling, and styled UI components.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first‑time user name entry with validation, error display, and save handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserProfile: Always‑open modal for creating a user profile name using a mutation hook and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/charts/EquityCur: Responsive line chart rendering equity balance over time with formatted axes and tooltips.
frontend/src/components/charts/MonthlyPe: Bar chart visualizing monthly profit in pips with positive/negative color coding.
frontend/src/components/charts/PairDistr: Pie chart showing trade distribution per currency pair with labeled segments and legend.
frontend/src/components/charts/SessionPe: Bar chart comparing trade count and win rate across trading sessions with legend and tooltips.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatPanel.t: Interactive chat interface letting users query trading metrics through predefined chatbot rules.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Analyt: Dashboard panel summarizing key performance metrics with safe numeric formatting and indicators.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/KpiGri: Displays a grid of KPI cards using formatted performance metrics with icons and color coding.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeFor: A full trade-entry dialog handling create/edit mode, validation, preset loading, and form state population.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradesTa: Renders a trades table with formatting, discipline indicators, and edit/delete actions with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/settings/StartFr: Provides a danger-zone UI allowing users to wipe all data, clear cache, and reload the app after confirmation.
Defines the main app layout with top bar, side nav, routed content area, and branded footer.
Implements a mobile slide-out navigation menu with branding, active-state styling, and route navigation.
frontend/src/components/shell/SideNav.ts: Static side navigation for large screens with active highlighting and route navigation.
frontend/src/components/shell/TopBar.tsx: Top bar with branding, mobile nav trigger, user avatar, profile dropdown, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/startup/AppError: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a recovery screen with reload support.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupE: Full‑screen startup error UI with optional technical details and async retry handling.
frontend/src/components/tools/Compoundin: Simulates compound account growth based on user inputs and displays results with a line chart.
frontend/src/components/tools/DrawdownRe: Calculates the required return to recover from a drawdown and displays explanatory output.
frontend/src/components/tools/LotSizeCal: Computes forex lot size using risk, stop distance, and pip value with live inputs.
frontend/src/components/tools/PipCalcula: Computes pip distance between two prices and shows price movement in pips.
frontend/src/components/tools/RiskOfRuin: Estimates probability of account ruin using win rate, average win/loss, and risk per trade.
frontend/src/components/tools/RiskPercen: React UI tool that computes risk percent from account size and risk amount using settings defaults and displays formatted output.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Centralized constants defining app branding assets, icons, name, and tagline.
frontend/src/domain/mappers.ts: Maps trade form data into a backend Trade object, computing risk, RR, violations, and normalized profit/loss values.
frontend/src/domain/types.ts: Type definitions for trades, form data, performance metrics, and related domain models.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to authenticated identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading/storing identity and exposing login, clear, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for profile, trades, settings, and reset operations using safe actor access and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safe backend actor hook with timeouts, retries, admin init handling, and query invalidation behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useStartupGate.ts: Implements a startup state machine that coordinates actor initialization and profile loading with timeout and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useStrategyPresets.ts: Parses and memoizes strategy presets from settings, exposing the preset list and a boolean flag.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for theming across dark, light, and unauthenticated modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with branding, creator story, and principle cards.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays trading KPIs, charts, summaries, and chat panel with loading and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Provides the trading journal UI with search, CRUD actions, CSV export, and trade form dialog.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders the settings UI, loads and edits user settings, and saves updates using backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/ToolsPage.tsx: Provides a tabbed interface for selecting and displaying various trading calculators.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Computes performance metrics, equity curves, drawdowns, and related analytics from trade data.
frontend/src/utils/breakdowns.ts: Generates monthly, pair-based, and session-based performance breakdowns from trades.
frontend/src/utils/chatbotRules.ts: Parses user queries and returns chatbot responses based on performance metrics.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Creates CSV exports of trades and triggers file download with proper formatting and escaping.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Contains safe formatting helpers for currency, numbers, percentages, ratios, and dates.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Extracts readable error messages from various error shapes, including nested and backend errors.
frontend/src/utils/icRejectParsing.ts: Provides helpers to parse IC reject errors into readable messages and detect backend-unavailable conditions.
frontend/src/utils/startupErrorClassific: Classifies startup errors into categories and builds user-facing error details using parsed IC error info.
frontend/src/utils/strategyPresets.ts: Parses newline-delimited strategy preset text into a trimmed, deduplicated list.
frontend/src/utils/toolsMath.ts: Contains math utilities for trading analytics like risk percent, compound growth, drawdown recovery, and risk of ruin.
frontend/src/utils/tradingCalculations.t: Implements core trading calculations including risk, lot size, RR, P/L, percent change, and pip value.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, and feature requests related to backend canister reliability and startup behavior.
